column4: My Terminal bell does not beep (echo -e '\a' ...no beep). Running 9.10, didn't work on 9.04 either. Anyone know if this can be fixed? Or if this is a bug?
Make sure your sound is turned up ( terminal beep no longer uses pcspkr )
The sound is turned up. I am guessing terminal beep is not possible on this particular machine.
If you are using 9.10 and you can hear other sounds the terminal beep should work
